message: * If using "Lock Screen", the screen will now sleep under Lion again.
Look forward to hearing everyone's feedback on it!
Version 2.0 is now in the review process.

* You can now make LockOut completely invisible - deselecting "Show In Menubar" no longer disables "Hide in Dock". If you make the app completely invisible, you can get back to the preferences by just opening the app from Finder again.
* Fixed a bug related to recording the keyboard shortcut.
* Fixed a bug some users were seeing on Lion where the application would launch but could not be interacted with.
Sorry for the delay - I've found a really severe bug that can completely lock up the computer.
I hope to get it figured out and re-submitted this coming week.
Unfortunately it's not just in my code - it's a problem with OS X itself that I'm triggering somehow - so I'm trying to figure out what's causing it and work around it.
Any new information about when v2 ist coming
Just went in to review - fingers crossed.
it has been 2 weeks how's the review going?
Got rejected after a long wait. Going to tweak and try again.
sorry to hear that, keeping my fingers crossed.
